description:
Give an enemy follower <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
flavorText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen
name: Unworthy

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
name: Baccai Sandspinner

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
name: Rite of Negation

description: Kill an ally to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
name: Rite of Negation

description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
name: Voice of the Risen

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Desert Naturalist

description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Teen Spirit

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
name: Raz Bloodmane

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
name: Sandcrafter

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir
name: Payday

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
flavorText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.
name: Ancient Preparations

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Baccai Reaper

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Hibernating Rockbear

description: <link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: I cost 2.
flavorText: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."
name: Callous Bonecrusher

flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
name: Ruin Runner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
flavorText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima
name: Taliyah

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
Attack: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
flavorText: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.
name: Taliyah

description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to Taliyah's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Throw another rock!" - Taliyah
name: Threaded Volley

description:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a Taliyah in your deck.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Taliyah's Stoneweaving

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
flavorText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"
name: Khahiri the Student

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally +2|+2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the Strongest ally +2|+2.
flavorText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.
name: Salt Spire

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

description:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
flavorText:
"The Emperor Azir, though haughty, is generous. Above all, he cares deeply for those who would march alongside him into Shurima's golden future, as the nation rises anew, its people once again united under his rule." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

description:
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Short of fulfilling his destiny, Azir's lifelong friend - and newly named brother - hatefully cast him off the dais. In that fateful moment Shurima was cursed, doomed to ruin for thousands of years to follow." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

flavorText: "They appeared out of nowhere, made up of swirling sands! Then, after they had dispatched our forces, their forms simply... disappeared, melted back into the desert." - Desert Survivor
name: Sandstone Charger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> and grant them +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Play and Round Start: Summon 2 Sand Soldiers and grant them +2|+2.
flavorText: Now more powerful than ever, Azir has raised his most loyal soldiers to lead his armies.
name: Golden Herald

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Azir</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
Create a Azir in your deck.
flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir
name: Azir's Arise!

description:
Enemies are <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Enemies are Vulnerable.
Round Start: Rally.
flavorText: "Observe our god-emperor! He knows the power of these lands better than any, and his army only grows. Shurima is risen, and it shall never fall again!" - Voice of the Risen
name: General's Palace

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Azir's legions were reputed to be unstoppable even before Shurima was reborn, but now they are truly innumerable.
name: Sand Soldier

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: The <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: "Behold! See how our champion sits astride the lion? Even the king of beasts would yield to his power, for he is the Will of Azir!" - Voice of the Risen
name: Eternal Gladiator

description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Obliterate an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Those who oppose us will be reduced to dust." - Azir
name: Crumbling Sands

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 3 enemy units or landmarks.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate 3 enemy units or landmarks.
flavorText: The storm rolls in with a peal like thunder, and when it passes, it leaves nothing behind.
name: Sandstorm

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText: The emperor's golden guard moves as one, a succession of regimented warriors that is as terrifying as it is impressive to behold.
name: Emperor's Guard

description:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral.
Draw 1.
flavorText: Between the sand, the sun, and the heat, it can be difficult to tell what is real, and what is merely a mirage.
name: Shimmering Mirage

description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> and <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link>. Immediately level them up to level 3.
descriptionRaw:
Rally.
Summon Renekton and Nasus. Immediately level them up to level 3.
flavorText: "They will serve their emperor. My generals will make sure of it." - Azir
name: Ascended's Call

description: Draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2.
flavorText: Birds found in the desert climes are all considered symbols of Azir, and Shurimans find their presence a good omen.
name: Emperor's Prosperity

description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
name: Xenotype Researchers

description:
Grant allied <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.
name: Desert's Wrath

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link>When I block or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I block or Attack: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give me +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create a Renekton in your deck.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Renekton's Ruthless Predator

description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I will spare no one!" - Renekton
name: Dominus Destruction

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
name: Ricochet

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
name: Shaped Stone

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Rock Hopper

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir
name: Arise!

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 0. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 0. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
name: Inner Sanctum

description: <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Fearsome
flavorText: "Yeah, you better be afraid." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Overwhelm
flavorText: "If I can't get past you, I'll just go through you." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Quick Attack
flavorText: "Quick as a flash." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: "The best just got better." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Challenger
flavorText: "Try turning me down." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Tough
flavorText: "Can't spend your earnings if you're dead." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: "Let's cut 'em down to size." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: "Go on. Gimme your best shot. Then it's my turn." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>
descriptionRaw: SpellShield
flavorText: "Your tricks ain't worth the sand you're standing on, kid." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
descriptionRaw: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
flavorText: "Nothin' better than a payday." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.
name: Sivir

description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.
name: Inspiring Marshal

description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it Vulnerable.
flavorText: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.
name: Roiling Sands

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 1: Summon an exact copy of the Obliterated unit I replaced.
flavorText:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers
name: Stasis Statue

description:
Draw 1.
If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> a unit this round, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
If you've slain a unit this round, Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.
name: Ruinous Path

description: Give enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round and summon 6 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies Vulnerable this round and summon 6 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: "My soldiers march on." - Azir
name: Emperor's Divide

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
name: Rite of Dominance

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 4+ units this game, an enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've slain 4+ units this game, an enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.
name: Rampaging Baccai

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
name: Destined Poro

description: I have 3 random keywords.
descriptionRaw: I have 3 random keywords.
flavorText: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.
name: Exalted Poro

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.
name: Exhaust

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
name: Unraveled Earth

description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
descriptionRaw: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
flavorText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir
name: Ascended's Rise

description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
flavorText: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.
name: Sanctum Conservator

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
flavorText:
"As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
-------
"Word of Azir's return has spread across the deserts, from Shurima to the world beyond. I have ensured that myself."
name: Dunekeeper

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"
name: Golden Ambassador

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.
name: Aspiring Chronomancer

description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rampaging Baccai</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Rampaging Baccai and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: The baccai are twisted, warped versions of what they might have been - had they become part of the Ascended Host - and the rage they feel at their failure must be unleashed somewhere.
name: Baccai Rampage

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavorText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. It is The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.
name: Preservarium

description:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 25</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>Restore the Sun Disc</style></link>.
When an Ascended ally levels up, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 10 rounds.
descriptionRaw:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
When an Ascended ally levels up, advance me 10 rounds.
flavorText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.
name: Buried Sun Disc

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
An ally Strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Siphoning Strike

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> and <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes the Strongest and Weakest enemies.
flavorText: "Better duck." - Sivir
name: Boomerang Blade

flavorText: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.
name: Clockling

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
Create a Nasus in your deck.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Nasus' Siphoning Strike

description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
Enemies have <nobr>-3|-0</nobr>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
Enemies have -3|-0.
flavorText: "His hope revived by Shurima's rise, Nasus finally returned after years spent wandering the desert, eager to make amends with his brother. He never suspected he would find Renekton maddened by years spent suffering at Xerath's hands in the tomb, waiting for him." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
Enemies have <nobr>-1|-0</nobr>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
Enemies have -1|-0.
flavorText: "For years, Nasus and his brother Renekton served the empire. Nasus was a scholar, Renekton a fierce warrior. It was not until the two were called upon to confront the betrayer, Xerath, that Nasus was forced to make a terrible choice..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, grant all allied copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.
name: Khahiri the Returned

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
flavorText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"
name: Devoted Council

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Buried Sun Disc</style></link> 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 2 rounds.
flavorText: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker
name: Esteemed Hierophant

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sivir</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a Sivir in your deck.
flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
name: Sivir's Ricochet

description: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
descriptionRaw: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
flavorText: "If you wanna work with me, I'll give you the same talk I give everyone: work for your share, and you'll get everything you're due. But if you slow me down, or get in my way, I'll kill you myself."
name: Sivir

description: Grant an allied landmark "My <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> completion effect activates twice".
descriptionRaw: Grant an allied landmark "My Countdown completion effect activates twice".
flavorText: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean
name: Promising Future

description: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
flavorText: "One life in return for so many. One life so that others might thrive." - Nasus
name: Weight of Judgment

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
name: Rite of Negation

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an ally and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an ally and summon a Stasis Statue in its place.
flavorText:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher
name: Ancient Hourglass

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Sandstone Charger.
flavorText: "The box might be worth something, but whatever's inside sure as sand isn't. By which I mean, it's not worth opening. Speaking from experience, here." - Sivir
name: Waking Sands

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Sai Scout

flavorText: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.
name: Bloodthirsty Marauder

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
flavorText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.
name: Sandstone Chimera

description:
Immediately draw 1 of all your Ascendants.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascendants are level 3.
descriptionRaw:
Immediately draw 1 of all your Ascendants.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascendants are level 3.
flavorText: "Shurima has known no glory like today. Come, bask in the light of our sun!" - Voice of the Risen
name: Restored Sun Disc

description: Kill an ally to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
name: Rite of Dominance

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
name: Rite of Dominance

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
flavorText: As they passed through the ravine, the Sandcrafter spoke the words of magic. A gust of wind echoed through the canyon and turned to the thunder of oncoming hooves.
name: Sandswept Tomb

description: Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 and an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Ruthless Predator

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
flavorText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus
name: Rite of Calling

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
name: Rite of Calling

description: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
name: Rite of Calling

description: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
descriptionRaw: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
flavorText: "We are where both gods and men find their end." - Sanctum Conservator
name: Conservator's Judgment

description: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Stoneweaving

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
name: Emperor's Dais

description: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Deal 2 to me" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies -2|-0 and "Round End: Deal 2 to me" this round.
flavorText: "Their spirits will burn." - Nasus
name: Spirit Fire

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -4|-0 and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
name: Quicksand

flavorText:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary
name: Grumpy Rockbear

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If the <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> of any of your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> is 4 or less, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them to 0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
flavorText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."
name: Draklorn Inquisitor

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant +2|+4 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
Plunder: Grant +2|+4 instead.
flavorText: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Spoils of War

flavorText: Freed from its icy tomb, the corrupted troll knew one thing, and one thing only - it must do as its dark mistress commanded.
name: Frostguard Thrall

description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
flavorText: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall
name: Cold Resistance

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
levelupDescription: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Watcher</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+. When I level up, create a Watcher in hand.
flavorText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."
name: Lissandra

description:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 4+ allies that cost 8+ this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 4+ allies that cost 8+ this game. 
Attack: Obliterate the enemy deck.
flavorText: "This is the end. As it was foretold -- as I promised. Sisters... forgive me." - Lissandra
name: Watcher

description:
Your Nexus is <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 0 cost <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Shard</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Your Nexus is Tough.
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Ice Shard in hand.
flavorText: Few know what Lissandra sacrificed in order to gain power, her ambitions too great to be stymied by mortal trappings.
name: Lissandra

description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lissandra</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Obliterate a unit and summon a Frozen Tomb in its place.
Create a Lissandra in your deck.
flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
name: Lissandra's Entomb

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 8</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frostguard Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 8: Summon a Frostguard Thrall.
flavorText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...
name: Frozen Thrall

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit and summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate a unit and summon an Frozen Tomb in its place.
flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
name: Entomb

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Summon an exact copy of the Obliterated unit I replaced.
flavorText: "Our lady will bury this world and all you know in ice." - Draklorn Inquisitor
name: Frozen Tomb

description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
Enlightened: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
flavorText: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.
name: Ancestral Boon

description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
Countdown 1: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.
name: Blighted Ravine

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra
name: Ice Shard

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Flash Freeze</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Fury of the North</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Entomb</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
flavorText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.
name: Three Sisters

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 2. 
Draw 2.
flavorText: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.
name: Whispered Words

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.guile><style=AssociatedCard>Guile</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Guile in hand.
flavorText: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy
name: Thorn of the Rose

description: An ally with 5+ Power <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally with 5+ Power strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc
name: Bloody Business

description: <link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally that <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> this round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the Strongest ally that struck this round.
flavorText: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."
name: Black Rose Spy

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.
name: Mimic

flavorText: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."
name: LeBlanc

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>LeBlanc</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a LeBlanc in your deck.
flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
name: LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice

description: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Seeing double?" - LeBlanc
name: Mirror Image

description: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mirror Image</style></link> in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a Mirror Image in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead.
flavorText: "...we all want the same thing."
name: LeBlanc

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavorText: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise
name: Shrieking Spinner

description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple
name: Crimson Bloodletter

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
name: Sigil of Malice

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion Marauders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Legion Marauders.
flavorText: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.
name: Strength in Numbers

description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
descriptionRaw:
The first time you slay a unit each round, I mark the Weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
levelupDescription: I've seen you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> 2 units with my mark<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you slay 2 units with my mark.
flavorText:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.
name: Kindred

description:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kindred</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a Kindred in your deck.
flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
name: Kindred's Spirit Journey

description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
descriptionRaw:
The first time you slay a unit each round, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the Weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
flavorText:
Death took the form of hunters 
None escape such as they
One cajoles with arrows and bow
One chases down its prey.
name: Kindred

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavorText: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.
name: Spirit Leech

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavorText: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor
name: The Etherfiend

description:
Draw 1.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Nightfall: Activate an ally's Nightfall effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
flavorText: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother
name: Unto Dusk

description: When another ally dies, or <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Toss 1.
flavorText: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain
name: Sea Scarab

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Lifesteal, Fearsome, and Ephemeral.
flavorText: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler
name: Song of the Isles

description: Give the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give the Weakest ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
flavorText: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb
name: Lamb's Respite

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and Fearsome if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."
name: Soulspinner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
flavorText: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?
name: Mask Mother

description: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavorText: "Eventually all will be forgotten." - The Etherfiend
name: The Second Death

description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit, then revive it.
flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
name: Spirit Journey

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
flavorText: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?
name: Fading Icon

flavorText: "They flicker through the dark forest, dotting the treeline like stars in the night sky, unaware of their pursuers." - Lamb
name: Prey

description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
flavorText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger
name: Production Surge

description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
flavorText: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko
name: Concurrent Timelines

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
flavorText: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.
name: Startipped Peak

description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
flavorText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric
name: Destiny's Call

description: When you play a Dragon, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> me and you draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer
name: Dragon Chow

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
name: Honored Lord

description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Cataclysm

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
name: Golden Aegis

description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
name: Battlefield Prowess

description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
flavorText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard
name: Tattered Banner

description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the Strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers.
flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cataclysm</style></link> in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the Strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm

description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
name: King Jarvan III

description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
descriptionRaw: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.
name: Towering Stonehorn

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
name: Penitent Squire

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
name: Gallant Rider

description: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
flavorText: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench
name: Loaded Dice

description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
descriptionRaw: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
flavorText: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher
name: Lost Riches

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has Ephemeral.
flavorText: "You are smokea whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi
name: Shadow Apprentice

description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
flavorText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.
name: Field Musicians
